revised_title: The Nature and Properties of Persulphuric Acids
tldr: The authors investigate the properties and composition of persulphuric acids, specifically focusing on the interaction between hydrogen peroxide and sulphuric acid. They propose that the main product of this interaction is an acid richer in sulphur trioxide than perdisulphuric acid, and suggest that it may be a member of the series H2O2'SO3.
